<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>GetOAuthToken</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    sm.setEndpoint("https://dev109517.service-now.com/oauth_token.do");
    sm.setHttpMethod("POST");
    sm.setRequestHeader("Accept", "Application/json");
    sm.setQueryParameter("grant_type", "password");
    sm.setQueryParameter("client_id", "72cbca92d0ce51102f4a294e518f7056");
    sm.setQueryParameter("client_secret", "qm~v:o.hN?");
	sm.setQueryParameter("username","OAuthIncidentUser");
	sm.setQueryParameter("password","9!H)y6+0oq)}ykh?ZIk5UY_(j[dF*T1Kf}n1zPeThj6nUKWv!FUAqYE0j_0N]UY<w.tgKfdn_.iMfjz2?dk;Ie@(?)EYkZQ{f43q");
	

    response = sm.execute();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    gs.info(responseBody);

    //Fetch Access Token from Response Body
    //var resp = new JSONParser().parse(responseBody);
    //gs.info('Access Token: ' + resp.access_token);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_58872_needit/generate_token/getoauthtoken</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getoauthtoken</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-22 14:01:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>3728261e97c69110a54377d71153af75</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetOAuthToken</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3728261e97c69110a54377d71153af75</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-22 14:22:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Generate Token">a018225e97c69110a54377d71153af45</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
